summary: I HAVE A EVENFLO ULTARA I TOWN & COUNTRY SECURE ADVANTAGE CHILD SEAT.  THE RED PINS SECURING THE SWING SHIELD CAME LOOSE WHILE I WAS DRIVING AND WHILE THE CHILD WAS IN THE SEAT, LEAVING THE CHILD COMPLETELY UNSECURE.  THIS COULD HAVE SERIOUSLY COMPROMISED THE SAFETY OF THE CHILD IF IT HAD HAPPENED IN AN ACCIDENT.*JB
